duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage end-to-end project management for Coupa, Ariba, Ecosys, and Anaplan implementations.
Work on-site at the Deer Park, TX location three days a week for efficient project coordination.
Demonstrate expertise in managing large ERP implementations in the Oil and Gas industry, with a focus on Downstream/Refineries.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful project delivery and client satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or Project Management (PMP Certification preferred)
